Review_title: Please do watch this after the official "Win or Lose" series to get the hows to this formed adventure of theirs!
Review_Text: This does a pretty good job of doing what a documentary should do, as I was able to comprehend the depth of the people's creativity and collaboration that made this happen.Interestingly, it is nice to see such a team of individuals in their specified fields; who work to create their finished sections into a gigantic masterpiece and that they have paved or reimagined new ways to animate amid storytelling by a process.And, that was all in the pursuit of wanting to capture anybody who watches it with such diversifying outlooks and walks of life through their nostalgic artistry in narrative.In essence, it is bound that one may find themselves relating to or just simply adoring what these people had gone through to make "Win or Lose."
